identity.name: CareerArchitect
identity.theme_strategy: Primary Light Mode (Paper/Document feel) with High-Contrast Dark Mode for power users.

landing_page.structure: Hero (Left Align Text, Right 3D/Image) -> Value Props (Bento Grid) -> How It Works (Step Zig-Zag) -> Testimonials -> Pricing -> Footer
landing_page.hero_style: Massive typography 'BEAT THE BOT'. Background subtle grid pattern.
landing_page.bento_grid: Use 'Tetris' mode. Mix text blocks with visual stats (e.g., '95% ATS Score' card).

resume_builder.structure: Split Screen. Left: Editor (Scrollable Form). Right: Preview (Sticky, Zoomable).
resume_builder.editor_panel: Clean, accordion-based sections. Minimal inputs. 'Zen Mode' toggle to hide sidebar.
resume_builder.preview_panel: Realistic paper rendering. Grey background (#E2E8F0) to make the white paper pop.

dashboard.widgets: Resume List (Grid), ATS Score History (Line Chart), Job Tracker (Kanban-lite).

buttons.primary: h-12 px-8 rounded-full bg-blue-700 text-white font-medium hover:bg-blue-800 hover:scale-[1.02] active:scale-[0.98] transition-all shadow-lg shadow-blue-700/20
buttons.secondary: h-12 px-8 rounded-full bg-white border border-slate-200 text-slate-900 hover:bg-slate-50 hover:border-slate-300 transition-all
buttons.ghost: h-10 px-4 rounded-lg text-slate-600 hover:text-slate-900 hover:bg-slate-100

cards.feature: p-8 rounded-2xl bg-white border border-slate-100 shadow-card hover:-translate-y-1 transition-transform
cards.pricing: p-8 rounded-3xl border border-slate-200 bg-white relative overflow-hidden. Highlight 'Pro' with a blue border ring.

inputs.default: h-11 rounded-lg border-slate-200 bg-slate-50 focus:bg-white focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-100 focus:border-blue-500 transition-all

ats_gauge.description: Radial progress circle. Center text shows score. Color changes based on value (0-50 Red, 51-79 Orange, 80+ Green).
ats_gauge.style: Use SVG or Recharts. Stroke width 12px. Rounded caps.

images.description: Clean, minimalist workspace top-down view. Use as subtle background or hero image.
Professional interview/meeting setting. Use for 'Get Hired' section.
Person focused on work/resume. Use for 'How it works' or features section.

motion.page_transition: initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 20 }} animate={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }} exit={{ opacity: 0, y: -20 }} transition={{ duration: 0.3 }}
motion.stagger_children: variants={{ hidden: { opacity: 0 }, show: { opacity: 1, transition: { staggerChildren: 0.1 } } }}

universal_guidelines: DO NOT use generic centered layouts. Use asymmetry.
Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all.
You MUST NOT center align the app container.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped.
NEVER use AI assistant Emoji characters.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
All interactive elements MUST include a data-testid attribute.

instructions_to_main_agent.file_types: Use .js and .jsx extensions for React files. Do not use .tsx.
instructions_to_main_agent.styling: Use Tailwind CSS for all styling. Use Shadcn UI components (customized) for complex interactions.
instructions_to_main_agent.state_management: Use React Context or simple state for the builder. Persist to localStorage/MongoDB.
instructions_to_main_agent.ats_logic: Mock the GPT-5.2 scoring for UI development if API is not available, but build the UI to handle async scoring states (Loading -> Result).
instructions_to_main_agent.monetization: Place AdSense placeholders in the Dashboard sidebar and below the Resume Preview. Add 'Upgrade to Pro' banners in the free tier.
